__e: They have a department for that... same building, uniforms and everything.
The only difference is over there people wear uniforms and slap each other on the back.
Do you think we all wear uniforms and drive cars that say "Police" on them?
OK. So, the girls I call need to come and collect your uniform for call-backs tomorrow.
Dressed them up in Fire Nation uniforms and put them on the frontline unarmed, way I heard it.
Now, what we've planned is to use you as uniforms for our friends who are coming soon.
Yeah, but that seems like way too much money for fake security uniforms, huh?
But, wait, I thought you said we can't wear our prison fatigues.
I asked for a detective seeing as how my customers tend to get scared away by uniformed cops.
